sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Plus, MessageSquare, CheckCircle, Clock, AlertTriangle, Edit, Trash2, Send, Eye, X, User, Calendar, BarChart3 } from 'lucide-react'; const Surveys = () => { const [showCreateSurvey, setShowCreateSurvey] = useState(false); const [showSurveyPreview, setShowSurveyPreview] = useState(false); const [previewSurvey, setPreviewSurvey] = useState(null); // Mock data const surveyTemplates = [ { id: 1, name: 'Monthly Check-in', description: 'Standard monthly team survey to track ongoing performance and well-being', questions: [ 'What achievement are you most proud of this month?', 'How would you rate your collaboration with the team?', 'Any energy drain or motivation issues you\'d like to discuss?', 'What did you learn recently that excites you?', 'How supported do you feel in your role?' ], category: 'Monthly', usage: 24 }, { id: 2, name: 'Quarterly Review', description: 'Comprehensive quarterly assessment for career development and goal setting', questions: [ 'What are your biggest accomplishments this quarter?', 'What challenges did you face and how did you overcome them?', 'What are your goals for the next quarter?', 'How can we better support your growth and development?', 'What feedback do you have for the team or leadership?' ], category: 'Quarterly', usage: 8 }, { id: 3, name: 'Well-being Check', description: 'Focused survey on mental health and work-life balance', questions: [ 'How would you rate your current stress level?', 'Are you experiencing any burnout symptoms?', 'What would help improve your work-life balance?', 'How supported do you feel in managing your workload?', 'What activities help you recharge outside of work?' ], category: 'Well-being', usage: 12 } ]; const activeSurveys = [ { id: 1, template: 'Monthly Check-in', assignedTo: 'Design Team', sentDate: '2024-01-15', dueDate: '2024-01-22', status: 'active', responses: 4, totalRecipients: 6 }, { id: 2, template: 'Well-being Check', assignedTo: 'Sarah Chen', sentDate: '2024-01-10', dueDate: '2024-01-17', status: 'completed', responses: 1, totalRecipients: 1 }, { id: 3, template: 'Quarterly Review', assignedTo: 'Engineering Team', sentDate: '2024-01-01', dueDate: '2024-01-15', status: 'overdue', responses: 8, totalRecipients: 12 } ]; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'active': return 'text-blue-400'; case 'completed': return 'text-green-400'; case 'overdue': return 'text-red-400'; default: return 'text-white/60'; } }; const getStatusIcon = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'active': return ; case 'completed': return ; case 'overdue': return ; default: return null; } }; const handlePreviewSurvey = (survey) => { setPreviewSurvey(survey); setShowSurveyPreview(true); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Surveys

Create and manage team surveys

{/* Active Surveys */}

Active Surveys

{activeSurveys.map((survey) => (

{survey.template}

{survey.assignedTo}

Sent: {survey.sentDate} Due: {survey.dueDate}

{survey.responses}/{survey.totalRecipients}

Responses

{getStatusIcon(survey.status)} {survey.status}
))}
{/* Survey Templates */}

Survey Templates

{surveyTemplates.map((template) => (

{template.name}

{template.description}

{template.category} {template.usage} uses

Questions:

    {template.questions.slice(0, 3).map((question, index) => (
  • {question}
    • ))} {template.questions.length > 3 && (
  • +{template.questions.length - 3} more questions
    • )}
))}
{/* Create Survey Modal */} {showCreateSurvey && (

Create New Survey

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((num) => (
{num}.
))}
)} {/* Survey Preview Modal */} {showSurveyPreview && previewSurvey && (

Survey Preview

{previewSurvey.name}

{/* Survey Header */}

{previewSurvey.name}

{previewSurvey.description}

Category: {previewSurvey.category} {previewSurvey.questions.length} questions Estimated time: {Math.ceil(previewSurvey.questions.length * 1.5)} minutes
{/* Survey Questions */}
{previewSurvey.questions.map((question, index) => (
{index + 1}

{question}

{/* Response Options */}
{question.toLowerCase().includes('rate') || question.toLowerCase().includes('satisfied') ? ( // Rating scale for satisfaction questions
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((rating) => ( ))} 1 = Poor, 5 = Excellent
) : question.toLowerCase().includes('balance') || question.toLowerCase().includes('stress') ? ( // Multiple choice for balance/stress questions
{['Very Poor', 'Poor', 'Fair', 'Good', 'Excellent'].map((option) => ( ))}
) : ( // Text area for open-ended questions
)}
))}
{/* Survey Footer */}

This survey will be sent to team members

Responses are anonymous and confidential

)}
); }; export default Surveys;
